entry.title: Lumex Walkane - Side Step Folding Walker Adjustable Height Aluminum - 2/case
entry.summary:
Vendor: GF Medical
Type: Side Step Folding Walker
Price: 80.00

Lighter than a walker, but more stable than a cane Folds easily with one hand
Ideal for users who do not require a walker but need a wider base for support

Contoured foam handgrips
Includes laminated color operating instructions Height range from 29” to 34”
Designed to meet the requirements of HCPCS Code E0135
300 lbs weight capacity

Part #6015A, 2/case

Features

  • Lighter than a walker; more stable than a cane
  • Folds easily with one hand
  • Ideal for users who do not require a walker but need a wider base for support and for individuals with the use of only one hand or arm
  • Contoured, foam hand grips are comfortable and provide secure hand hold
  • Comfortable, dual level handgrips provide support from a seated to standing position

entry.title: UpRise Onyx Folding Walker - 1 or 2/ case
entry.summary:
Vendor: GF Medical
Type: Single Release Folding Walker
Price: 62.00 - 114.00 (2 variants)

Folding Walker

Combination of folding walker, rising aid and toilet safety frame all in one
Secondary handle provides stable assistance from seated to standing Single release folding mechanism

Contoured, PVC handgrips for enhanced comfort
Includes laminated color operating instructions
Adjustable height in easy 1” push button increments Designed to meet the requirements of HCPCS Code E0135

Part #700175C

Features an attractive, upscale Onyx finish constructed of durable aluminum tubing to provide strength yet remain lightweight. The adjustable height, in easy 1" push-button increments, fits a broad range of users. Combination of folding walker, rising aid, and toilet safety frame all in one. Secondary handles provide stable assistance from a seated to standing position. Single-release folding mechanism is designed to aid users with limited hand dexterity. Contoured, PVC handgrips for enhanced comfort and secure hold. Includes laminated color operating instructions. Lifetime limited warranty.

entry.title: Dual-Release Folding Walker w/ Wheels (4/cs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: GF Medical
Type: Dual-Release Folding Walker
Price: 214.00

Folding Walker, 5" Fixed Wheels, Adult, 4/cs

Dual Release Folding Walker Adult Lumex® Aluminum 300 lbs. 34-1/2 to 41-1/2 Inch

Feature a raised H-Frame design to facilitate over toilet positioning Contoured, textured hand grips designed for secure handhold Dual release folding mechanism enables user to fold walker side independently Rear glide caps to facilitate use on all surfaces 5” fixed wheels Accommodates all leg attachments Folded depth of 4” Meets the requirements of HCPCS Code E0135

entry.title: Dual-Release Folding Walker (4/cs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: GF Medical
Type: Dual-Release Folding Walker
Price: 190.00

Folding Walker, Adult, 4/cs

Feature a raised H-Frame design to facilitate over toilet positioning Contoured, textured hand grips designed for secure handhold
Dual release folding mechanism enables user to fold walker side independently

Adjustable height to fit a broad range of users Durable 1” aluminum tubing
Accommodates all leg attachments
Folded depth of 4”

Meets the requirements of HCPCS Code E0135

Part #616070A

Features a raised H-frame design to facilitate over-toilet positioning. The contoured, textured handgrips are designed to offer a safe, secure handhold, and the dual-release folding mechanism enables the user to fold walker sides independently. Adjustable height fits a broad range of user heights. These walkers include laminated color operating instructions. Lifetime limited warranty.
